Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Hey, hey, hey! THIS poll asks what Jume 
means. Not kidding! Vote here, unless 
you ppl want a return visit from 
Computron... (leaves that threat 
hanging) 
 

  o Jume is... Jume?  
  o Ask Computron.  
  o Don't ask Computron!  
  o www.m-w.com says "The word you've entered isn't in the dictionary. " about 
  o Jume is Jer's two pet rats, yes both of them.  
  o Jume isn't Jer's dog, he doesn't have one, though it could be a random dog.  
  o (what KSLawdogg thinks Jume is). 
  o Jume is the epicentre of a crazy earthquake.  
  o Choice 9.  
  o Jer's slogan for when he runs for Council.  
  o Jume is the Council's slogan?!? *chokes* Gawd NO!  


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
